snippet: After two weeks of cautious, sometimes halting remarks, Mayor Bill de Blasio blasted the language of police unions and those who turned their backs on him at two officers’ funerals.
abstract: Feistier side of New York Mayor Bill de Blasio emerges as he proves he is not intimidated by rift with Police Department that is turning into serious issue for his administration; blasts law-enforcement unions for suggesting deaths of two officers was City Hall's fault.
lead_paragraph: After two weeks of cautious, sometimes halting remarks, Mayor Bill de Blasio blasted the language of police unions and those who turned their backs on him at two officers’ funerals.

headline.main: Feistier de Blasio Appears, Uncowed by Police Unions
headline.print_headline: Feistier de Blasio Appears, Uncowed by Police Unions
